product_name: Dr. Bronner's Baby Mild Liquid Soap - 2 fl. oz.
long_description: This travel-size bottle of Dr. Bronner's Baby Mild liquid soap contains no fragrances, and all oils and essential oils are certified organic. Great for babies and people who have allergies or sensitive skin. 2 fl. oz. size is great for travel. Packaged in 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles. Dr. Bronner's Baby Mild liquid soap and all ingredients are certified to not have been tested on animals.
short_description: This travel-size bottle of Dr. Bronner's Baby Mild liquid soap contains no fragrances, and all oils and essential oils are certified organic.
